plot: Bob Ramsing interviews Dirch Passer in his home about the loss of Kjeld Petersen, and about Dirch's future plans on stage and in the movies.
title: Farvel 63
plot_es: Bob Ramsing interviews Dirch Passer in his home about the loss of Kjeld Petersen, and about Dirch's future plans on stage and in the movies.
plot_en: Bob Ramsing interviews Dirch Passer in his home about the loss of Kjeld Petersen, and about Dirch's future plans on stage and in the movies.
